author: yorickdowne
content: If I heard right on the call, the concern comes from the testing team. Shall or must, the team still must test it: And that’s going to create a delay.

author: yorickdowne
content: I really want FOCIL. But not at the cost of delaying Glamsterdam. The brainstorm the coming two weeks to make sure it can make it into Hegotá seems like the right move to me.

author: potuz
content: on FOCIL, perhaps it could go in
